constructor-arg.value:
<bean id="EvsServiceInfo" class="java.util.HashMap"> <constructor-arg> <map> <entry key="APPLICATION_SERVICE_BEAN" value-ref="LexEVSApplicationService"/> </map> </constructor-arg> </bean>
<bean id="DistributedProxyHelper" class="org.LexGrid.LexBIG.caCore.client.proxy.LexEVSProxyHelperImpl" singleton="false"> </bean>
<bean id="interceptor" class="org.LexGrid.LexBIG.caCore.client.proxy.LexEVSApplicationServiceProxy"> <property name="proxyFactory"> <ref bean="DistributedProxyHelper"/> </property> </bean> <bean id="applicationService" class="org.springframework.aop.framework.ProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="target"> <bean class="org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceUrl" value="URL_KEY/http/applicationService"/> <property name="serviceInterface" value="org.LexGrid.LexBIG.caCore.interfaces.LexEVSApplicationService"/> <property name="httpInvokerRequestExecutor"> <bean class="org.LexGrid.LexBIG.caCore.client.proxy.ProxyUnwrappingHttpInvokerRequestExecutor"> <property name="proxyHelper" ref="DistributedProxyHelper"/> </bean> </property> </bean> </property> <property name="interceptorNames" value="interceptor"/> <property name="interfaces" value="org.LexGrid.LexBIG.caCore.interfaces.LexEVSApplicationService"/> </bean> <bean id="authenticationProvider" class="org.acegisecurity.providers.rcp.RemoteAuthenticationProvider"> <property name="remoteAuthenticationManager"> <bean class="org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceUrl" value="URL_KEY/http/remoteAuthenticationManager"/> <property name="serviceInterface" value="org.acegisecurity.providers.rcp.RemoteAuthenticationManager"/> </bean> </property> </bean> <alias alias="LexEVSApplicationService" name="applicationService"/>;
